title: error when compiler\rustc_builtin_macros\src\format.rs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust just run cargo install bottom ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.64.0-nightly (23e21bdd2 2022-07-15) binary: rustc commit-hash: 23e21bdd25026e2839ebe946c2a937c1904887d2 commit-date: 2022-07-15 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.64.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling time v0.3.11 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 1 but the index is 2', compiler\rustc_builtin_macros\src\format.rs:1001:28 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7ffa28229d4f - ::fmt::h307917635c002872 1: 0x7ffa282654aa - core::fmt::write::h7c145a3ad923bd2a 2: 0x7ffa2821cbaa - ::fmt::h6f1e6f75cd82fad9 3: 0x7ffa2822d74b - std::panicking::default_hook::h93058762785c9b20 4: 0x7ffa2822d377 - std::panicking::default_hook::h93058762785c9b20 5: 0x7ffa220dd234 - ::hash 6: 0x7ffa2822e12c - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::hd52b3c7b82c3f7ee 7: 0x7ffa2822dead - ::get::h136700dfa82d6086 8: 0x7ffa2822aa47 - ::fmt::h307917635c002872 9: 0x7ffa2822db80 - rust_begin_unwind 10: 0x7ffa2829b475 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::h8fdb7c372ffbd9c8 11: 0x7ffa2829b397 - core::panicking::panic_bounds_check::hd441d9d239650abe 12: 0x7ffa2026c11b - ::make_items 13: 0x7ffa20264877 - ::make_items 14: 0x7ffa21c15172 - ::fully_expand_fragment 15: 0x7ffa20753bc7 - ::expand_crate 16: 0x7ffa1fad25ba - ::link 17: 0x7ffa1fae43a7 - ::pre_expansion_lint 18: 0x7ffa1facda5b - ::expansion 19: 0x7ffa1faa5cd4 - 20: 0x7ffa1fabdf97 - rustc_driver[ac76e66f7f3697ae]::args::arg_expand_all 21: 0x7ffa1faa77f9 - 22: 0x7ffa1faa82fd - ::fmt 23: 0x7ffa2823f04c - std::sys::windows::thread::Thread::new::h864ff1b78a448a0f 24: 0x7ffa9e1d54e0 - BaseThreadInitThunk 25: 0x7ffa9fb0485b - RtlUserThreadStart error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.64.0-nightly (23e21bdd2 2022-07-15) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C opt-level=3 -C linker-plugin-lto -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=0 note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `time` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: failed to compile `bottom v0.6.8`, intermediate artifacts can be found at `C:\Users\yx\AppData\Local\Temp\cargo-installt7JnUM` ```
Backtrace

``` ```
